Elementary Program Cambridge & National

Curriculum Highlights

  • Global Perspective

    Foster a broad worldview by incorporating international content and cultural awareness, encouraging students to understand and appreciate diversity.

  • Student-Centered Learning

    Focus on personalized learning approaches, promoting critical thinking and independent inquiry while addressing individual student needs and strengths.

  • Skill Development

    Emphasize the development of core academic skills, including literacy, numeracy, and scientific thinking.

National Curriculum

  • Personalized Learning

    Emphasize student autonomy and flexibility in learning, allowing students to explore their interests and learn at their own pace.

  • Character Building

    Focus on the development of key moral values, including integrity, empathy, and respect, aiming to nurture studentsâ€™ character and social-emotional well-being

  • Contextual and Local Content

    Incorporate local wisdom, culture, and community-based learning, connecting students with their heritage and environment while preparing them to be global citizens.

We use a variety of assessment methods to track student progress and provide feedback

Portfolio Assessments

Collections of student work showcasing their growth and achievements.

Formative Assessments

Ongoing assessments to monitor learning and guide instruction

Summative Assessments

Periodic tests and projects to evaluate overall understanding

Regular Parent-Teacher Communication

Keeping parents informed about their childâ€™s progress and addressing any concerns

Sustainability Approach

Environmental Awareness

Incorporate lessons and activities that raise awareness about environmental issues, promote sustainable practices, and encourage students to take action to protect the planet.

Project-Based Learning

hands-on projects that address real-world sustainability challenges, such as waste reduction, energy conservation, and biodiversity preservation.

Community Engagement

Foster partnerships with local organizations and initiatives that promote sustainability.

Contact Us

Your child's future matters to us. Connect with our team to learn more about our educational approach, schedule a school tour, or begin the enrollment process.
